column1:
Legotechnic_maniac,"2017-03-22T22:52:26.417Z","I love it. ","

The set was great for people getting started into technic. Like all of the small technics it has a lot more functions than you would think. I was a good size, maybe a little bit bigger than I expected. The best function is probably
column2: working the crane on the digger.

column1:
,TRUE,4,5,4,4,5 chefkaspa","2017-06-25T13:10:53.29Z","Didactic B model","

I bought this set for parts without any particular interest in building it. When I first saw the A model I thought that this could have been a CITY set rather than Technic.
As the smaller sets appear to have A and B instructions included I decided to build the B model &quot
column3: to see what it will be like before parting out the set.

column1: This vehicle will probably never win a price for being good looking. However, it is full of functions:
• Unloading of loading space by means of wide track
• Lowering and raising of plow by lever
As an entry set, this small truck is packed with features that demonstrate the diversity of transferring mechanical input into an action.

,TRUE,4,3,4,5,3 robot3r","2019-03-12T16:53:48.607Z","Great Set, Bad features","

This set is an easy one to build, but basic mechanisms
column2: and basic construction causes it not to be as fun of a build. This set would be a good one for young KFOLs&nbsp
column3: with no technic experience. The playability was good.
